General.Name: Talam Transform Bhd
General.Description: Talam Transform Berhad, an investment holding company, engages in the property development business in Malaysia. It operates through Property Development, Property Investment and Management, and Construction segments. The company develops residential and commercial properties. It is also involved in the rental and disposal of properties; and construction activities, as well as provision of project management, money lending, and agriculture services. The company was formerly known as Trinity Corporation Berhad and changed its name to Talam Transform Berhad in August 2013. Talam Transform Berhad was incorporated in 1920 and is headquartered in Kuala Lumpur, Malaysia.
